global.metaDescription: SmartPablo is the easiest invoice app for small businesses ever.
home.pageTitle: SmartPablo. Free invoice tool online for businesses.
home.heroSection.text: Try SmartPablo for free, the easiest invoice app for small businesses ever.
home.meetSection.heading: Meet SmartPablo.
home.meetSection.text: Feel free and try it on your own! Making an invoice in SmartPablo takes less than a minute. With autocorrect on, SmartPablo will fill in the data from the previous editing. Isn't that smart?
home.featureSection.heading: Features
home.featureSection.features.0.title: Any currency, any language?
home.featureSection.features.0.text: Create invoices in any currency using or any language. With Pablo you really have no boundaries. Invoices in USD, EUR, to Australia or Europe? No problem!
home.featureSection.features.1.title: Powerfull Tax
home.featureSection.features.1.text: Handle taxes worldwide. Sales Tax in US, VAT in EU, GST in Canada. Have multiple tax nexuses? Physical or economical? No problem either.
home.featureSection.features.2.title: Open API
home.featureSection.features.2.text: Easily integrate any system with SmartPablo. Because of our RESTful API, SmartPablo is open for integration and extension.
home.featureSection.features.3.title: Custom Logo and Design
home.featureSection.features.3.text: Give your invoices a brand look that will express your business most! Your logo will give your invoices a professional look! Put your logo on the invoice and customize colors.
home.templatesSection.heading: Design your own invoice!
home.storiesSection.copy: "Perfect app for invoicing! Makes accounting look much, much easier. @SmartPablo, thank you, for saving my time!"
home.storiesSection.author.name: Tomas Vajda
home.storiesSection.author.title: CEO BackToQuality.sk
home.freeSection.heading: Free for everyone
home.freeSection.text: Feel free and try it on your own! Making an invoice in SmartPablo takes less than a minute. With autocorrect on, SmartPablo will fill in the data from the previous editing. Isn't that smart?
pricing.heroSection.heading: Free for everyone, suited for you!
pricing.heroSection.text: Great app for your great business.
